## Problem 1 using Loops 

- Write a program to print the sum of first 10 numbers in Python.

## Answer 1 using Loops 


```{python}
#| echo: true
#| output-location: fragment

num  = 10
sum = 0 
while num >= 1:
    sum = sum + num
    num -= 1 
print(sum)
```
